name: piucane-monorepo
description: PiuCane - Il benessere del tuo cane
author: PiuCane Team

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps && npm run build:api
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:ui && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:web && npm run build:admin
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:web" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:api"
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps && npm run test:api
scripts.test:packages: cd packages/ui && npm test && cd ../lib && npm test
scripts.test:apps: cd apps/web && npm test && cd ../admin && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:apps && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:packages
scripts.lint:apps: cd apps/web && npm run lint && cd ../admin && npm run lint
scripts.lint:packages: cd packages/ui && npm run lint && cd ../lib && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:apps && npm run type-check:api && npm run type-check:packages
scripts.type-check:apps: cd apps/web && npm run type-check && cd ../admin && npm run type-check
scripts.type-check:packages: cd packages/ui && npm run type-check && cd ../lib && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: npm run clean:apps && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:packages
scripts.clean:apps: cd apps/web && rm -rf .next dist && cd ../admin && rm -rf .next dist
scripts.clean:packages: cd packages/ui && rm -rf dist && cd ../lib && rm -rf dist
